value.stringValue: Internal Legal Instruct External Legal Team

customErrorMessages.errorMessage: SAP contract is required before acquiring consent.

rules.name: SPEN_SAPContractRequired
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( (2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) )
rules.label: SAP Contract Required
